```{r}
groceries %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = starts_with("3"),
    names_to = "date",
    values_to = "value") %>%
  group_by(FIPS) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = FIPS, y = value))+
  geom_col()
```
